sentences.en: a pizza topped with cheese and anchovies
A real pizza oven gives better results than an ordinary home oven.
sentences.cn: 专门的比萨烤箱比普通家用烤箱效果更好。

sentences.en: He shared a pizza with his son Laurence.
sentences.cn: 他和儿子劳伦斯分吃了一张比萨饼。

sentences.en: It takes hundreds of thousands of dollars to get into the franchised pizza business.
sentences.cn: 要想得到比萨店的特许经营权，需要支付一大笔钱。

sentences.en: Jed nodded, finishing off the last piece of pizza.
sentences.cn: 杰德点点头，把最后一块比萨饼吃完。

sentences.en: Let's send out for a pizza and watch The Late Show.
sentences.cn: 我们叫一份外卖比萨然后看《深夜秀》吧。

sentences.en: The minimum start-up capital for a Pizza franchise is estimated at $250,000 to $315,000.
sentences.cn: 申请比萨饼店的品牌特许经营权的最低启动资金估计为25万到31.5万美元。

sentences.en: The pizza tastes delicious without any cheese at all.
sentences.cn: 不加奶酪的比萨饼很好吃。

sentences.en: They dug into the pizza hungrily.
They have computerized systems to ensure delivery of the right pizza to the right place.
sentences.cn: 他们已经实现了系统的计算机化，以保证比萨的送货准确无误。

sentences.en: We went for a pizza together at lunch-time.
sentences.cn: 我们中午一起去吃了比萨饼。

sentences.en: We were told the pizza would be delivered in 20 minutes.
sentences.cn: 我们被告知比萨饼20分钟后送到。

sentences.en: You can put a lot of different pizza toppings on a pizza base.
sentences.cn: 你可以在比萨饼底衬上加不同的顶配料.

trans.tran_en: A pizza is a flat, round piece of dough covered with tomatoes, cheese, and other toppings, and then baked in an oven
A pizza is a flat, round piece of dough covered with tomatoes, cheese, and other toppings, and then baked in an oven
